title: Anyone else think this years worlds is not enjoyable to watch?
body: The game is literally decided by a which adc can do more damage its so stupid, like riot hasn't even fixed it for us when these next few patches wont be touched in pro play. I was really hyped for this worlds before it started but now it's so boring to watch adc vs adc and ardent censer race.

replies.body:
The upsets are a joy to watch, but the team compositions are incredibly dull. The current meta is incredibly bad for entertainment, because it is very slow. Its just two walls moving towards each other with an adc behind it single-handedly winning the game.

Play-making supports and carry junglers/top-laners are much more fun to watch.

this years worlds has been i believe very upset heavy and very interesting for years when its been tank meta and adc's were useless so its nice to see adc's be able to play and actually affect the game.
Be careful with that comment. Even mentioning its good that adc meta is fun then the circle jerk on the boards will downvote you :p

lmao this meta is cancer I can't wait until riot fixes this shit. personally I enjoy playing rengar but hes in such a shit spot and adc strength makes him almost useless. this meta is the opposite of fun

That is highly opinionated. Am I an adc main? yes. But I much prefer this meta to the "adc 2k17" meta. Even though in that meta it wasn't adc's being weak it was tanks being too strong. I like this meta much more than that meta because adc has much more diversity (in solo queue not esports)  and I really think people are blowing how strong adc are out of proportion. Is ardent strong? yes. But I have had games where I or the enemy adc gets fed but my solo laners do well and shut him down. I think the real problem in this meta is the jungle position.  Jungle is such an important role right now and basically can win you so many games based on what jungler picks a better ganking jungler or sejuani because shes total bs right now.

I don't mind adc being strong but its just they they are too strong, ardent locket knights vow and redemption just enable them to fuck up too hard and still live because of the amount of defensive tools that are available. Also, tanks are too weak right now as they are basically walking locket. Champion wise there is a good amount of diversity with xayah, twitch, kog, trist, varus, and situationally ashe. For items its always the same with either ie/essence reaver, rfcannon and shiv, or rageblade bork.

I personally think supports just need to not be adc's bitches XD I think ardent is still to strong. I also think other playmaking supports don't have the best itemization. Also I think solo queue adc diversity is way higher. The adc's you listed plus jinx, jhin, oh and we cant forget about kalista, and now cait is creeping back into the meta as well. I basically think that there are enough situations in solo queue that any adc can play (except ezreal because tear is garbage).
Especially since the games are at 3:00 am  -_-''
I just dont like that i have to strain my body to watch all the games.. at fucking 3 in the morning...
It is definitely a very interesting group stage. Many fans may be salty. Some fans may have legitimate complaints about the meta.

if your referring to my tsm icon then lol, they played like shit. They didn't deserve to move on if they play like that. I understand your comment because most tsm fans would be salty but even watching other regions play it makes no sense, the amount of power you get from a 2300 gold item is so dumb imo.

Didnt even see your icon. 
I think Ardent is overstated, even if it is dictating support picks sadly. This worlds has already shown how important draft and early teamplay is.
i just hope i get to see more talyah picks, thats what i was hoping for this time around
It's fine as long as you're not an NA fan.
Personally, it has been the most interesting worlds since season 2
